column1: This Vit. C cream really lightens dark spots on African American skin! For by doing so, it's ingredients contain several types of skin lightening forms of Vit. C. Leaving the skin soft with intense antioxidant properties and the building of collagen as well. "Please do not change this formula or lessen the potency". For I will remain a purchaser/user forever, as long as everything in regards to this formula remains the same. Thank You
Been using it a week and I can tell a big difference on my acne scars I have tried other products for dark spots and this is the best one of all..
I have been using this for almost a month.. and I have to say I've noticed a difference in my skin. No more dry patches :)
